title: How Many Calories Are in a Cookie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a cookie, including macros like carbs, fat, protein, plus per-cookie nutrition facts and variations for chocolate chip types.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Cookie?
assumptions: Standard medium chocolate chip cookie (~16 g), baked with butter, flour, sugar, and chips; average homemade or store-bought.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, size, ingredients, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard chocolate chip cookie has about 78 kcal and 10 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add chopped nuts (e.g., 5 g walnuts per cookie)
Use oatmeal instead of chocolate chip

faqs.q: How many calories in a chocolate chip cookie?
faqs.a: About 78 kcal for a standard medium-sized one.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one cookie?
faqs.a: Around 10 g total carbs, including 6 g sugars and 0.5 g fiber.
